article.title: Georgia Tech to Support Army Threat Simulator Program
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Georgia Tech Applied Research Corporation, Atlanta, Georgia, was awarded a $45 million firm-fixed-price and cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the services in support of the Army Threat Simulator Program Support.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Aberdeen Proving Ground, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
